articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- A seminar of personnel in the field of social sciences took place on Thursday to mark the first anniversary of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's letter "Our Social Sciences Should Actively Contribute to Accomplishing the Cause of Modeling Whole Society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism".
					 The work published on December 1, Juche 101 (2012) recalls that the Academy of Social Sciences has contributed to firmly upholding the ideas and authority of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the leader and developing the ideas and theories of the party and carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche and clarifies the basic tasks facing the field of social sciences at present. 
					
					 The seminar heard papers explaining and proving the originality and validity of the ideas and theories clarified in the letter.
					
					 The speakers said the social sciences of the DPRK are shining with the ideas and august names of the leaders and fulfilling their mission as a powerful ideological and theoretical weapon for steering the popular masses' cause of independence as they have the great ideological and theoretical exploits performed by the peerlessly great men as their historical treasures and eternal foundation.
					
					 They referred to the fact that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il founded with their rare ideological and theoretical wisdom the Juche idea and Songun idea the basic objective of which is to realize the independence of the popular masses and thus developed the social sciences into revolutionary and Juche-based ones on the basis of these ideas.
					
					 Proceeding from the requirements of the Korean revolution which has reached a new phase of its development, Kim Jong Un formalized the revolutionary ideas of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and set forth it as the supreme programme of the WPK to model whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, they added.
					
					 They underlined the need to glorify forever the great ideological and theoretical exploits of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and actively contribute to carrying out the cause of modeling whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism with great achievements in their researches.
					
					 Present there were teachers, researchers, lecturers, journalists, editors and officials in the fields of social sciences, education, preservation of revolutionary historic relics and national heritage, media and institutions for training party cadres.

articles.title: Greetings to Mauritanian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Mauritanian President
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Mauritanian President Mohamed Ould Abdel Aziz on the occasion of the  53rd anniversary of the independence of the country.
					 Kim in the message wished the Mauritanian president and his people greater success in the work for defending peace and stability of the country and achieving economic development and prosperity, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Greetings to Palestinian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Palestinian President
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine, on the occasion of the Day of the World Solidarity with the Palestinian people.
					 The message said that the Korean people are extending invariable support and solidarity to the Palestinian people in their just cause of terminating the Israel's occupation and retaking the legitimate national rights including the right to found an independent state with East Kuds as its capital.
					
					 It wished the president and people of Palestine fresh success in their struggle to put an end to Israel's illegal moves for expanding settlements and racial suppression in the territory of Palestine and achieve fair and lasting peace in the Mideast.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Ugandan Women's Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Ugandan Women's Delegation
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with the delegation of the Ugandan National Women's Council headed by acting Chairperson Pauline Kirasha which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets Polish Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Polish Ambassador
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun on Thursday met and had a talk with outgoing Polish Ambassador to the DPRK Edward Pietrzyk.

articles.title: Secretariat of CPRK Raps S. Korean Regime for Suppressing Religious Body
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Raps S. Korean Regime for Suppressing Religious Body
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) issued its information bulletin 1054 on Thursday in denunciation of the south Korean puppet conservative group's desperate moves to suppress the Catholic Priests' Council for Justice by labeling it "forces following the north."
					 The puppet conservative group is brutally suppressing the council's just struggle, after labeling it "forces following the north" by linking it with the north, it said, and went on:
					
					 This is nothing but a last-ditch frenzy of those who feel guilty in the wake of the full disclosure of its election rigging. 
					
					 This time such religious body as the above-said council came out in demand of Park Geun Hye's resignation. This was reflection and eruption of south Korean public anger at the conservative group keen to revive the "yusin" dictatorship after seizing power by use of all sorts of government power and illegal methods.
					
					 Where there is oppression, there always comes resistance. It is quite natural that people come out in protest actions in south Korea where injustice, illegality and fascist dictatorship prevail.
					
					 The puppet regime branded even the religious organization as "forces following the north" for the mere reason that the latter uttered words displeasing the former. This only proves that "the forces following the north" touted by the regime are no more than an excuse for politically-motivated suppression of them.
					
					 The south Korean conservative group is attempting to fabricate another case like the one of Ri Sok Gi by branding the above-said religious organization as "the one following the north" as it did against the Unified Progressive Party. However, it will only touch off bitterer public resentment and fiercer mass resistance in south Korea.
					
					 It is the universally accepted conscience of humankind and a well-deserved right of everybody to support justice and censure injustice.
					
					 Moreover, we can neither remain indifferent to the strong demand and voices of south Korean people calling for justice as compatriots nor overlook the south Korean conservative forces' crackdown upon their struggle by linking it with the north.
					
					 We will as ever stand by the south Korean people who have risen up for justice and democracy and positively support their just struggle.
					
					 Park Geun Hye chiefly to blame for the fraudulent election can never be able to shirk her responsibility for it.

articles.title: Ugandan Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Ugandan Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Ugandan National Women's Council headed by acting Chairperson Pauline Kirasha visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 It went round historic relics preserved with much care at the old home in Mangyongdae where the President was born and nurtured a great intention of revolution, spending his childhood.
					
					 The head of the delegation said:
					
					 Visiting the old home in Mangyongdae, I came to know well about the revolutionary life of Kim Il Sung and his family members.
					
					 He embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years and liberated the country.
					
					 Mangyongdae is an important place for educating the rising generation in a revolutionary way.
					
					 The delegation also visited the e-library and swimming gymnasium of Kim Il Sung University, Munsu Water Park, Breast Tumor Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital, Okryu Children's Hospital, etc.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ugandan National Women's Council headed by acting Chairperson Pauline Kirasha and other foreign guests on Thursday visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state.
					 The guests paid tribute to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before their statues.
					
					 They entered the halls where the Generalissimos lie in state and paid homage to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the Generalissimos received are on display and the halls that house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 The head of the Ugandan delegation wrote in the visitor's book:
					
					 The Korean people boundlessly revere their leaders.
					
					 The feats of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will always be remembered by the Korean people and progressive mankind.

articles.title: SPA Delegation Returns Home
articles.content:
SPA Delegation Returns Home
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK headed by Deputy Kim Song Hui returned home on Thursday after taking part in the meeting of women parliamentarians of Northeast Asian countries held in Mongolia.

articles.title: Delegation of Minju Joson Returns Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Minju Joson Returns Home
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Minju Joson headed by Vice Editor-in-Chief Jon Jong Ho returned home on Thursday after visiting China.

articles.title: Delegation of Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports Back Home
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports headed by Vice-Minister Son Kwang Ho returned home on Thursday after visiting China.

articles.title: National Technical Innovation Contest Held
articles.content:
National Technical Innovation Contest Held
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- A national technical innovation contest of the April 15 technical innovation shock brigades was held to mark the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Participated there were the shock brigades of industrial establishments and cooperative farms across the country. The contest lasted from mid-February to early in September.
					
					 The shock brigades of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex, the Puryong Ferroalloy Factory, the Sinrip Coal Mine of the Kaechon Area Coal-mining Complex and others made research achievements and technical innovations conducive to strengthening the material and technological foundations of the major industrial sectors and giving fullest play to the production potentials.
					
					 Shock brigade members of the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Processing Factory, the Sinuiju Streptomycin Factory, the Posok Cooperative Farm in Unjon County, the Hwangju County Farm Machine Station, the Sinchon County Food Administration Station and many other units have modernized and automated major production processes and equipment by putting production on a scientific and technological basis.
					
					 Industrial establishments across the country introduced thousands of valuable technological innovation proposals during the contest and thus contributed to strengthening the independence of the Juche-based industry and gave big interests to the state.
					
					 A ceremony for summing up the contest took place at the Grand People's Study House on Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were officials concerned, model shock brigade members and field officials.
					
					 The standings of the contest were announced and silk banners and citations were awarded to the units which proved successful at the contest.

articles.title: Autumn Land Management Campaign Conducted in DPRK
articles.content:
Autumn Land Management Campaign Conducted in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- An autumn campaign of land management has been conducted throughout the DPRK.
					 Pyongyang citizens planted at least 57,000 trees and dug pits for more than 1,800 trees. They also repaired and repainted many multi-storey buildings and carried out such works as paving roads of tens of thousands of square meters, laying curbstones and planting turf of new species.
					
					 North Hamgyong Province conducted the construction of revetment covering over 30 000 square meters and 10-odd structures and the repair of three bridges, as part of the work for improving Chongjin-Rason Road. And it planted 10,000 trees of good species along the road.
					
					 Its cities and counties situated along rivers are concentrating efforts on river improvement projects and the face-lifting of promenades.
					
					 North Phyongan and South Hamgyong provinces, too, stepped up embankment projects in rivers and reservoirs to prevent flood damage.
					
					 South Hwanghae and Ryanggang provinces directed big efforts to modernizing tree nurseries, laying a solid foundation for increased production of saplings.
					
					 Meanwhile, Nampho City built 10-odd parks and 15 skate parks. And it covered with turf and other plants vacant grounds and roadsides covering more than 900,000 square meters.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Refutes Hostile Forces' Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Resolution"
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Refutes Hostile Forces' Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Resolution"
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Recently, the U.S. and other hostile forces railroaded an anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" through the Third Committee of the 68th UN General Assembly. It is peppered with all sorts of lies and fabrications. 
					 This is another serious politically-motivated provocation aimed to tarnish the dignity and image of the DPRK as it is a height of politicization, selectivity and double-standards in the human rights issue.
					
					 Great irony is that the south Korean puppet regime, as it did last year, not only took an active part in cooking up the "resolution" as a "cosponsor" but "welcomed" it before any others.
					
					 Does the puppet regime have face to talk about other's "human rights" issue?
					
					 As already reported, shortly ago agents of the south Korean puppet Intelligence Service (IS) were disclosed and arrested by a Chinese security organ while attempting to take away DPRK citizens to south Korea after luring and abducting them with plot-breeding organizations and flesh traffickers involved. 
					
					 It is well known to the world that this is not the first case.
					
					 Their acts of luring and abducting inhabitants of the DPRK, irrespective of adults or children, are needless to say human rights abuses and unpardonable crimes against humanity.
					
					 The world knows no such despicable guys as south Korean gangsters who have openly committed the above-said crimes in broad daylight in wanton infringement upon the sovereignty of other country and international law.
					
					 South Korea has turned into the worst tundra of human rights where democratic freedom and rights of its people are wantonly violated. Due to the revived "yusin" fascist dictatorship not only rights of the progressive organizations and personages desirous of independence and reunification but also those of guiltless people are mercilessly violated.
					
					 It is preposterous for the south Korean regime to talk about someone's "human rights" performance, behaving as if it were a "human rights judge" like the U.S., though it has turned south Korea into a veritable hell. 
					
					 The puppet regime is working with bloodshot eyes to abuse the issue of human rights for sinister purposes of inciting confrontation with compatriots and between the social systems at the U.S. beck and call. This is nothing but a base behavior inviting ridicule of everyone.
					
					 All facts go to clearly show who should be placed in the dock of the international human rights tribunal.
					
					 The puppet regime should bear in mind that it will have to pay a dear price if it persists in the anti-DPRK human rights racket in conspiracy with the U.S.
					
					 The hostile forces that foolishly try to infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and do harm to its dignified socialist system will not be able to escape a stern judgment by history.

articles.title: Originality of Political Theory Clarified by WPK's Songun Revolutionary Idea Underscored
articles.content:
Originality of Political Theory Clarified by WPK's Songun Revolutionary Idea Underscored
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article underscores the originality of the political theory clarified by the Songun revolutionary idea of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). It says:
					 The political theory clarified by the Songun idea of the WPK represents the theory on a revolutionary leadership method and political mode whereby the party and government of the working class organize and lead the popular masses' activities for the revolution and construction in a coordinated manner by applying the theory and principle of Songun revolution.
					
					 The originality of the political theory lies in that it formulated Songun politics as a main political mode under socialism and clarified from a new angle the issue of the ideological and moral factor of guaranteeing the enforcement of Songun politics.
					
					 It also developed in depth the theory on the leadership system and leadership art on a new high stage as required by the era and the developing revolution.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il clarified in a unique manner the philosophy on arms in which a revolution starts and advances and is brought to completion by dint of arms, the principle of Songun that an army precisely means a political party, state and people and the principle of giving priority to military affairs and putting the army before the working class and pursued Songun politics based on them.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary idea clearly indicates that the revolutionary soldier spirit of the Korean People's Army is the bottom line of Songun politics. In other words, it is the ideological and moral factor providing a sure guarantee for the full establishment of Songun politics and its successful enforcement.
					
					 The system of Songun leadership means unitary leadership system of the supreme commander over all revolutionary armed forces with the People's Army as the core and the system of state administration giving importance to defense.
					
					 In the above-said political theory the theory on the three revolutionary forces of Songun politics constitutes an important component part.
					
					 Thanks to the new clarification of the theory that the three revolutionary forces--Juche-oriented revolutionary party, invincible revolutionary armed forces and the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks-- are the mainstay of Songun politics and a powerful driving force for carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche, the WPK's theory of  Songun  politics serves as a more perfect revolutionary theory.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Pursuing Policy for Division and Contradiction
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Pursuing Policy for Division, Contradiction
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on Nov. 25 carried an article titled "Park Geun Hye's policy for confrontation fostering division and contradiction".
					 The article recalled that Park in a meeting of senior secretaries that day revealed her attempt at suppression of the mass on the situation held by the Jonju Parish Priests Group of the south Korean Catholic Priests' Council for Justice, clamoring for an "act of inviting confusion and division."
					
					 It is very belligerent that Park said she would not overlook those involved in the mass on the situation, it said, adding this reminds us of the time when Park Chung-Hee was liable to instruct the arrest and investigation.
					
					 It is the past inheritance to threaten the people as they are not to the liking of the one, it noted.
					
					 Park Geun Hye is to blame for the escalating division and contradiction as she did not thoroughly cope with the case of the illegal interference of power organs in the election, it held.
					
					 It expressed concern over the evermore undisguised confrontation by the regime and the ruling party with Park's remarks as a momentum.
					
					 It is not democratic to disregard public opinion as it is voice bad to hear, put down it and bind it unconditionally, the article stressed.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Slams "Government" for Suppressing Religious Organization
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Slams "Government" for Suppressing Religious Organization
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People in an article on November 26 assailed the puppet government authorities for inciting confrontation.
					 The article recalled that south Korea is swept by whirlwind of suppression under the pretext of "forces following the north" after the Jonju Parish Priests Group of the south Korean Catholic Priests' Council for Justice held a mass on the situation protesting against the illegal election and demanding Park Geun Hye step down.
					
					 The article went on:
					
					 Park Geun Hye, Chongwadae, "government" and the "Saenuri Party" feigned ignorance of the fraudulent election held with the Intelligence Service, the Ministry of Defense, Patriots and Veterans Affairs Agency, etc. involved but all of them kicked off the ideological confrontation all at once. 
					
					 The fact that Park is taking the lead in creating the atmosphere of "strong counteraction" reminds people of the period of the military dictatorship in which the dictator made threatening statements toward the people when the situation turned unfavorable to him.
					
					 The present "government" is branding even a religious organization as "a force following the north", afraid that the movement calling for Park's resignation is developing into a campaign of people of various circles. 
					
					 After all, the standard whereby the authorities label people as "forces following the north" has become clear. All those who chide the "government" or call for "the president's" resignation are branded as "forces following the north."

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Urged to Clarify Data on Japanese Imperialists' Killing of Koreans
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Urged to Clarify Data on Japanese Imperialists' Killing of Koreans
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The Christian Presbyterian Church of south Korea and the Solidarity of Citizens for Korean Victims of the 1923 Great Quake in Japan held a press conference at the "National Assembly" on November 25 in demand of the clarification of the specific data on the Japanese imperialists' killing of Koreans.
					 Speakers at the press conference held that Japan has denied the mass killing of Koreans during the great Kanto quake, claiming that the then military police and soldiers protected Koreans. 
					
					 However, a document from the south Korean embassy proved the fact that a Japanese military policeman shot a Korean to death, they said, and went on:
					
					 At that time the Japanese imperialists brutally killed Koreans with iron hooks, pickaxes and bamboo spears. But the Japanese authorities played down or denied all those facts and are even spearheading the distortion of history textbooks. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean regime has never urged the Japanese authorities to make a formal investigation and apology. The regime kept mum about the records of merciless killing of Koreans though they had been kept in the embassy. But the regime claimed they were accidentally opened to public. How can the people understand this? 
					
					 The regime should urge Japan to open all data on mass killings of Koreans during the great Kanto quake, make a formal apology and reparation and stop distorting history textbooks and, at the same time, start a formal investigation with Japan at an early date.

articles.title: Ceaseless Accidents in S. Korea
articles.content:
Accidents Continue in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- A fire broke out at a construction site in Kuro-dong, Kuro District, Seoul on Nov. 26, according to south Korean CBS.
					 The accident left two persons dead and hurt several others.
					
					 Poisonous gas leaked from a company of Hyundai Iron and Steel Co. in Songak township, Tangjin City, South Chungchong Province on the same day, doing harm to nine persons at work, one of them reported dead.

articles.title: Korean in U.S. Denounces Park Geun Hye Regime's Repressive Politics
articles.content:
Korean in U.S. Denounces Park Geun Hye Regime's Repressive Politics
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- An editor of Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., posted an article denouncing the south Korean puppet group on November 25. 
					 The article said:
					
					 A south Korean conscientious religionist urged Park Geun Hye to step down because the last "presidential election" was the illegal one in which the Intelligence Service and other power bodies interfered. 
					
					 But Chongwadae, the "Saenuri Party", conservative media and other group of Park Geun Hye are suppressing him and the religious organization, claiming that "it was the same assertion as the north's". 
					
					 The Park group has always told lies. The shameless group has covered up its crimes while suppressing people after labeling them the "forces following the north" and deceived the people with lies and fabrications whenever a chance presented itself to speak. 
					
					 South Korean society is in the grip of a crisis. 
					
					 Park Geun Hye and the "Saenuri Party" are spoiling south Korean society. 
					
					 They falsify truth to cover up this hard fact and persistently suppress workers, peasants, opposition parties, progressive media, conscientious religionists, youth and students by use of "government" power. 
					
					 Their weapon for suppression is a coloring theory such as "forces following the north" and "Reds". 
					
					 However, this coloring theory is no longer workable. 
					
					 Park Geun Hye and the "Saenuri Party" will not be able to escape severe punishment by history unless they honestly atone for their crimes and step down.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Malaysia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Malaysia
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- A Malaysian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated on Nov. 23.
					 The manager of the Dombo Enterprise Company was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee fixed the remembrance period from Nov. 23 to Dec. 18 and decided to organize diverse political and cultural events.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 They included remembrance meetings, seminars and a lecture in Germany, Nepal and Benin from November 21 to 23.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Germany said at the remembrance meeting that Kim Jong Il was a great leader who dedicated himself to the country and its people all his life.
					
					 He noted that thanks to Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership the DPRK made a long drive despite the imperialists' persistent moves to stifle it.
					
					 Speakers including the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) said holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was an expression of the Korean people's profound reverence and trust in him who performed great exploits on behalf of the country and revolution.
					
					 They noted Kim Jong Il is always remembered not only by the Korean people but by progressive humankind as he defended socialism and laid a firm foundation for building an economic power and improving the people's living standard with his Songun politics.
					
					 The president of the Socialist Party of Benin said in his lecture:
					
					 Kim Jong Il strengthened and developed the WPK into an invincible guiding force and the DPRK into an invincible socialist state and the Korean People's Army into a matchless and powerful army.
					
					 He, at the same time, turned the whole country into a big family by pursuing politics of love and trust and a politico-ideological power based on the single-minded unity of all people and laid an eternal foundation for carrying out the socialist cause to the last, undeterred by any tempest of history.

articles.title: DPRK Table Tennis Players Introduced by Chinese Paper
articles.content:
DPRK Table Tennis Players Introduced by Chinese Paper
 Beijing, November 27 (KCNA) -- The November 24 issue of the Chinese People's Daily carried an article titled "Ace players crowned with laurels of victory together after cutting conspicuous figures in table-tennis" contributed  by its Pyongyang correspondent.
					 DPRK players Kim Hyok Bong and Kim Jong defeated all their rivals and won gold medals at the 52nd World Table Tennis Championship held in Paris and the 6th East Asian Games in Tianjin, China, the paper said, and went on:
					
					 Spectators were deeply impressed by the two champions making salutes towards the flag of the DPRK at the podium. Particularly Kim Jong, tears rolling down from her eyes, was appreciated as a "very beautiful girl" by netizens.
					
					 The DPRK government hosted a banquet in their honor and provided them with new flats.
					
					 Kim Hyok Bong said that he and Kim Jong received very deep loving care, adding they would surely repay it.
					
					 They are now busy preparing for the 2016 Olympic Games.

articles.title: Seminario de ciencias sociales sobre obra de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Seminario de ciencias sociales sobre obra de Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, 28 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 28 el seminario de la rama de ciencias sociales dedicada al 1o aniversario de la publicacion del mensaje del Mariscal Kim Jong Un "Nuestras ciencias sociales deben contribuir activamente al cumplimiento de la causa de transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo".
					El trabajo publicado el primero de diciembre del 101 (2012) de la Era Juche, senala que la Academia de Ciencias Sociales ha defendido la idea y el prestigio del Partido y el lider y contribuido al desarrollo de la idea y teoria del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y al cumplimiento de la causa de la revolucion de Juche.
					
					Igualmente aclara el deber principal asumido actualmente ante el sector.
					
					En el seminario fueron publicadas las disertaciones que explican y argumentan la originalidad y la justicia de la idea y teoria dilucidas en el mensaje.
					
					Los oradores subrayaron que las ciencias sociales de Corea brillan con  idea y  nombre del lider y cumplen la mision como poderosa arma ideo-teorica que guia la causa  independiente de las masas populares, porque las grandes hazanas ideo-teoricas preparadas por los grandes hombres sin pares sirven del patrimonio historico y la base eterna.
					
					Dijeron que los grandes Generalisimos, con la extraordinaria perspicacia ideo-teorica, crearon la idea Juche, la del Songun, cuyo nucleo es la materializacion de la independencia de las masas populares y bajo la bandera de dichas ideas  convirtieron las ciencias sociales en las revolucionarias y autoctonas.
					
					Destacaron que a partir de la demanda de la revolucion coreana llegada a una nueva etapa de desarrollo, el Mariscal formulo la idea revolucionaria de los Generalisimos como kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo y presento como supremo programa del Partido la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun esta doctrina.
					
					Apuntaron la necesidad de glorificar eternamente las grandes hazanas ideo-teoricas acumuladas por los grandes hombres sin pares del monte Paektu y contribuir activamente al  cumplimiento de la trasformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo con grandes exitos en el estudio de las ciencias sociales.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los profesores, investigadores, conferenciantes, periodistas, redactores y funcionarios de los sectores de ciencias sociales, educacion, historia revolucionaria, proteccion del patrimonio nacional, prensa e informacion y de las instituciones de formacion de cuadros del partido.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se solidariza con justa causa de pueblo palestino
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se solidariza con justa causa de pueblo palestino
Pyongyang, 28 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de solidaridad mundial con el pueblo palestino, Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio hoy un mensaje de felicitacion a Mahmoud Abbas, presidente del Estado de Palestina. 
					En su misiva, el remitente senala que el pueblo coreano envia invariable apoyo y solidaridad a la justa causa del pueblo palestino para dar punto final a la ocupacion de Israel y recuperar los legitimos derechos nacionales como la fundacion de un Estado independiente con Kuds oriental como su capital.
					
					Desea al destinatario y su pueblo nuevos exitos en su lucha por parar la ilegal ampliacion de asentamientos y la represion racista de Israel en el territorio palestino ocupado y por lograr la paz justa y duradera en el Medio Oriente.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Mauritania
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Mauritania
Pyongyang, 28 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, remitio hoy un mensaje de felicitacion a Mohamed Ould Abdel Aziz, presidente de la Republica Islamica de Mauritania, en ocasion del 53o aniversario de la independencia de ese pais.
					En su misiva, el remitente desea al destinatario y su pueblo mayores exitos en sus labores para defender la paz y la estabilidad del pais y lograr el desarrollo economico y la prosperidad. 
					
					Manifiesta la conviccion de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises.

articles.title: CRPP acusa a banda de titeres surcoreanos de reprimir entidad  religiosa
articles.content:
CRPP acusa a banda de titeres surcoreanos de reprimir entidad  religiosa
Pyongyang, 28 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que la banda de conservadores del Sur de Corea se desespera por exterminar al Cuerpo Nacional de Sacerdotes Catolicos por la Realizacion de la Justicia tildandole de "entidad pro-Norte", el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica hoy la informacion no. 1054:
					Los titeres surcoreanos reprimen salvajemente  la lucha justa de ese cuerpo vinculandolo con la RPDC y tildandolo de "entidad pro-Norte", lo cual constituye los ultimos esfuerzos desesperados de quienes sienten remordimiento por la revelacion de la verdad de las elecciones ilegales.
					
					Esta vez, hasta la entidad religiosa como el cuerpo citado insistio en la retirada de Park, lo cual es el reflejo de la opinion publica surcoreana indignada a la banda de conservadores surcoreanos que se entrega al resurgimiento de la dictadura de "Yusin" tras arrebatar el poder con las coacciones y maneras ilegales.
					
					Habra la resistencia donde exista la represion y es natural que se despliegue la lucha de los habitantes en el Sur de Corea donde reinan la injusticia, las ilegalidades y la dictadura fascista.
					
					Tildar hasta a la entidad religiosa como la "seguidora al Norte" por haber dicho palabras que no les agradan a los titeres surcoreanos muestra que las fuerzas "pro-Norte", que cuestionan tanto ellos, no son mas que un pretexto de su represion politica.
					
					Ellos intentan inventar el segundo caso de Ri Sok Gi calificando el citado cuerpo de sacerdotes de "entidad pro-Norte" como hicieron con el Partido Progresista Unido.
					
					Pero, esto no tendra otro resultado que aumentar la indignacion del pueblo y hacer mas fuertes las protestas masivas.
					
					Apoyar la justicia y condenar la injusticia son la conciencia universal de la humanidad y un derecho justo de todos.
					
					La RPDC no puede dar espaldas al clamor y la voz justa de sus compatriotas, los habitantes surcoreanos, ni pasar por alto la represion a estos que comete la banda conservadora surcoreana bajo el cartel de la purga de fuerzas "pro-Norte".
					
					Al igual que en el pasado, la RPDC estara siempre al lado de los habitantes surcoreanos levantados por la justicia y la democracia y apoyara activamente su justa lucha.
					
					La gobernante actual es precisamente la criminal principal de las fraudulentas elecciones presidenciales y ella no puede eludir jamas su responsabilidad.

articles.title: ACNC rechaza en su comentario la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC
articles.content:
ACNC rechaza en su comentario la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 28 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Recientemente, Estados Unidos y otras fuerzas hostiles aprobaron en el tercer comite del 68o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea colmada de datos fraudulentos.
					Siendo el climax de la politizacion del tema de derechos humanos, la selectividad y la pauta de doble rasero, la fabricacion de ese documento significa otra grave provocacion politica para manchar la dignidad y la imagen de la RPDC.
					
					Lo ridiculo del caso es que la banda titere surcoreana tomo activa parte en la fabricacion de la "resolucion" ofreciendose como "coproponente" y la aplaudio primero en cuanto ella fuera publicada.
					
					?Tiene acaso la banda de traidores surcoreanos la calidad de cuestionar el problema de "DDHH" de otros?
					
					Como ya trascendidos, hace poco, el organo de seguridad publica de China descubrio y arresto a las entidades intrigantes y los traficantes de seres humanos que a las ordenes del Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea, secuestraron a los habitantes de la RPDC y trataban llevarlos al Sur de Corea.
					
					Todo el mundo sabe que ese caso no es la primera vez.
					
					Sin lugar a dudas, el rapto y el secuestro indiscriminado contra los adultos y ninos constituyen una violacion de DDHH y un crimen antietico nunca perdonable.
					
					En este mundo no hay otros tipejos tan sucios como los gangsteres surcoreanos que cometen a plena luz del dia los actos de rapto y secuestro violando sin escrupulos la soberania de otro pais y hasta el derecho internacional. 
					
					Hoy dia, el Sur de Corea es el peor infierno del mundo donde se violan flagrantemente la libertad y derechos democraticos. 
					
					Debido al resurgimiento de la dictadura fascista de "Yusin", se violan los derechos humanos de las entidades y personalidades progresistas aspirantes a la independencia y la reunificacion y hasta de los habitantes inocentes. 
					
					Es muy ridiculo que en tales circunstancias, los titeres surcoreanos cuestionaran los "derechos humanos" de alguien actuando como "juez de DDHH" imitando a EE.UU. 
					
					El proceder grosero de ellos, que tratan de utilizar el tema de DDHH en sus malsanos objetivos de enfrentamiento con el regimen de la parte connacional, provoca la risa burlona de todo el mundo. 
					
					La realidad demuestra quien es el que debe sentarse en el banquillo de acusado del tribunal internacional de DDHH. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos deben tener presente que pagara muy caro su campana de DDHH anti-RPDC, lanzada en confabulacion con EE.UU. 
					
					Sera condenado por la historia el ridiculo intento politico de las fuerzas hostiles de abusar del tema de DDHH para violar la soberania de la RPDC y derrocar el muy digno regimen socialista de ella.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun destaca originalidad de teoria politica proveniente de idea del Songun
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun destaca originalidad de teoria politica proveniente de idea del Songun
Pyongyang, 28 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este jueves, el diario Rodong Sinmun destaca la originalidad de la teoria politica aclarada por la idea revolucionaria del Songun del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, y continua:
					Esa teoria y el metodo politico del partido y el Estado de la clase obrera exigen a estos organizar y dirigir de modo unificado las actividades de las masas populares por la revolucion y la construccion materializando los principios de la revolucion del Songun.
					
					Su originalidad reside en que formulo la politica de Songun como principal modo politico del socialismo y aclaro nuevamente los factores ideo-espirituales que garantizan la implementacion de ella.
					
					Ademas, se manifiesta en que ha desarrollado y enriquecido en nueva altura la teoria sobre el sistema y el arte de direccion conforme a la demanda de la epoca y la revolucion en desarrollo.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il presento de modo original la filosofia del fusil, segun la cual la revolucion se inicia, se desarrolla y se lleva a feliz termino con las fuerzas armadas, y los fundamentos del Songun de que el ejercito es precisamente el partido, el Estado y el pueblo y los principios de "priorizacion militar" y "ejercito primero, clase obrera despues".
					
					Y practico la politica de Songun materializando esos principios.
					
					La idea revolucionaria del Songun del Dirigente muestra claramente que el espiritu revolucionario de los militares del ejercito popular es la base fundamental de esa politica y el factor ideo-espiritual que garantiza el establecimiento general y el cumplimiento exitoso de la misma politica.
					
					El sistema de la direccion del Songun es el de direccion unica del Comandante Supremo sobre las fuerzas revolucionarias en general cuyo nucleo es el ejercito popular y el de administrar el Estado dando prioridad a la defensa nacional.
					
					La teoria politica tiene otro componente sobre las 3 fuerzas revolucionarias de la politica de Songun, o sea, el partido revolucionario del Juche, las invencibles fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y la unidad monolitica de las filas revolucionarias.
					
					Al establecer que ellas son pilares de la politica de Songun y motor potente de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la teoria politica de Songun del PTC devino la perfecta y la mas revolucionaria.
